recommendations.body: **Masks** are recommended if your community risk level is high, you have recently been exposed to or infected with COVID, or you’ve been told by a health professional to wear a mask based on your personal risk factors.
**Vaccines** are now approved for children 6 months and older, to protect against infection, serious illness and death from COVID.

**Testing** is important if you experience symptoms or have been recently exposed to COVID. The Test to Treat initiative provides high-risk individuals who test positive with immediate access to antivirals at certified locations.

cta.text: Find a Test to Treat location

recommendations.body: **Booster shots** [offer necessary protection](https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#covidnet-hospitalizations-vaccination) against infection, serious illness and death from all COVID variants, and are [90% effective at preventing hospitalization](https://www.cdc.gov/mmwr/volumes/71/wr/mm7104e3.htm?s_cid=mm7104e3_x) from Omicron.

footer.shareText: Please share with policy makers, business owners, and any other decision makers, especially if these recommendations don’t match reality.
